10.text: The lights are up as Bristol gleams

12.text: and feels the festive spirit breathe

14.text: Crispy leaves are squished by feet

19.text: From way up high on Clifton's peak

24.text: The Christmas buzz of busy bees

28.text: Running round with lists of things

29.text: as 'Do they know it's Christmas?' rings

31.text: At night when stars are twinkly

35.text:
each time excited kids will
be

39.text: it's eight more, seven more, six more sleeps

44.text: it means a lot of different things

49.text: a break from those revision weeks

54.text: For others it's the mixed cuisines

58.text: Those silly themes over chilly feet and

63.text: Around the tree we passed presents

68.text: We pine after new and hope the list

72.text: just like we did last year

76.text: not just the angel's cedar top

79.text: no one does this year round

82.text: there's enough to fill our boots

87.text: All it takes is a tree

88.text: to take us back to our roots

90.text: As students head home for Christmas Eve

93.text: And Bristol sleeps with wishful dreams

95.text: We realise the real gifts we see

97.text: Aren't just beneath a Christmas tree.
